radiographic_examinations.findings: A 1 cm left lower lobe pulmonary nodule; no evidence of pleural effusion or airspace consolidation; hepatic parenchyma within normal limits; few small subcentimeter gallstones near the gallbladder neck; mild inflammatory changes surrounding the pancreatic head; multiple bilateral renal cysts; extensive colonic diverticulosis; no enlarged lymph nodes; unremarkable vasculature; no aggressive bone lesions.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up with CT in 3 months for the left lower lobe pulmonary nodule.
